section_title: Act to apply only to Scotland, and short title.
Act to apply only to land held for farming purposes; save as respects register of sequestrations.
Corn, &c. purchased bona fide, and delivered and removed, to be free from hypothec.
Hypothec not to be available beyond three months after rent is payable.
Stock of third party taken on a farm to graze to be liable only to the amount of consideration payable for the grazing.
When agricultural produce or stock is sequestrated, incompetent to sequestrate furniture, implements, imported manures, &c.
Register of sequestrations for rent to be kept.
